content: dk-weight basic sock pattern 48 sts yarn dk-weight sock yarn ≈ 220 260 m / 100 g needles 3 25 4 0 mm us 5 6 adjust for gauge gauge ~22 sts × 30 rounds = 10 cm / 4 in stockinette size adult medium eu ~38 40 for larger feet knit foot longer before toe cuff using german twisted cast on cast on 48 stitches join to work in the round being careful not to twist work 2×2 rib k2 p2 around repeat for 5 7 cm 2 2 75 or to desired cuff height i like to knit it so it will reach the middle of the shins leg work stockinette in the round knit every round for few row i usually do 8 row or desired leg length heel flap german-style slipped stitch divide stitches heel stitches 24 instep stitches 24 place on hold work heel flap flat over 24 stitches row 1 rs k3 k1 slip 1 across k3 row 2 ws k3 purl to last 3 st k3 repeat row 1 2 for 24 row square heel flap you should have 12 gartr ridges in the edges heel turn work short row over the 24 heel stitches row 1 rs k12 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn continue in this manner until all stitches are incorporated gusset pick up stitches along heel flap pick up 12 sts along each side and 1 more stitch in the gap between heel and instep stitches total of 13 sts picked up in eah side rejoin instep stitches stitch count now heel 14 gusset pickups 26 instep 24 total 62 sts gusset decreases round 1 knit to last 2 gusset sts k2tog knit instep ssk knit to end round 2 knit all stitches repeat these 2 rounds until 48 sts remain foot knit in stockinette until foot measures ~4 cm 1 5 shorter than total foot length measured from back of heel toe round toe dk-weight friendly divide stitches evenly 24 sts top 24 sts bottom decrease round k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before midpoint k2tog k1 repeat for bottom half plain round knit all stitches repeat these 2 rounds until 16 stitches remain in each side then knit only decrease rounds until only 10 stitches left in each side close toe using kitchener stitch םייניע dk 48 טוחל תיסיסב ברג תמגוד םרג / 100 מ ≈ 220 260 dk יבועב ברג טוח טוח גייגל המאתהל מ מ 3 25 4 0 תוגרסמ ןימי תגירסב מ ס = 10 םיבוביס 30 × םייניע 22־כ gauge תופיפצ eu 38 42 ינוניב רגובמ הדימ ןהובה ינפל רתוי הכורא לגרה ףכ תא םיגרוס רתוי תולודג םיילגר תופכל cuff תפח german twisted cast on תטישב םייניע48 תולעהל הדובעה תא בבוסל אלש הדפקה ךות בוביסב הגירסל רבחל 2×2 טנטפ גורסל בוביסה לכ ךרואל לאמש 2 ןימי2 יוצרה הבוגל וא מ ס5 7 ךשמב ךכ
